scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build:node && npm run build:bundler && npm run build:web
scripts.build:bundler: wasm-pack build --target bundler --release --out-dir dist/bundler && rm dist/bundler/.gitignore
scripts.build:node: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-dir dist/node && rm dist/node/.gitignore
scripts.build:web: wasm-pack build --target no-modules --release --out-dir dist/web && rm dist/web/.gitignore
